name: Great Fairy Pass
description:
Cirno and Daiyousei are playing a ball together. I wonder how many times can they keep the ball in the air?

This is a rhythm game where a short pass goes a single beat, and a long pass goes two beats. Press the buttons to the assigned characters alternatively to reach for the highest combo!

Tip : if you have trouble getting the rhythm to start properly. Restarting the game or forcing a pass on the right beat will fix the problem.
